detail_desc: Large bucket bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and drawstring at the top. Unlined. Size approx. 15x29.5x31.5 cm.
Bag in grained imitation leather with fringing, an adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Size 9.5x27x32.5 cm.
Set with a T-shirt and denim shorts. Patterned T-shirt with an open chest pocket. 5-pocket denim shorts with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly. Slim fit.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details and a text print on the coin and back pocket. Adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and buttoned cuffs.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with a pompom on the top and reversible sequins on the front and on the turned-up hem.

Cotton twill joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knee and elasticated hems.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace and microfibre with lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a wide strap with three pairs of hooks and eyes at the back.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and deep kangaroo pockets. Contrasting colour grosgrain trims down the sleeves, elastication at the cuffs and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Fleece lining.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a polyester filling. Detachable, lined hood with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back. Zip down the front, chest pocket, flap side pockets with a press-stud and one zipped sleeve pocket. Adjustable hook and loop tabs and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a flap back pocket with a press-stud, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. Seamless.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, cut-out section front and back, a knot detail at the front and metal fastener at the back.
